languages.text: Fortress world characters' first {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} in combat costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Reloading a weapon grants an additional +10 stacks of never stop shooting.

traits.locale_text: Fortress world characters' first reload in combat costs 0 AP. Reloading a weapon grants an additional +10 stacks of never stop shooting.
Fortress world characters' first {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} in combat costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Reloading a weapon grants an additional +10 stacks of never stop shooting.
Fortress world characters' first {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} in combat costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Reloading a weapon grants an additional +10 stacks of never stop shooting.

languages.text: 要塞世界的角色在战斗中首次{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}重新装填{/g}时，不会消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。此外，重新装填武器会额外叠加10层“全力开火”效果。
languages.original_text: Fortress world characters' first {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} in combat costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Reloading a weapon grants an additional +10 stacks of never stop shooting.

traits.locale_text: 要塞世界的角色在战斗中首次重新装填时，不会消耗任何行动点数。此外，重新装填武器会额外叠加10层“全力开火”效果。

languages.text: La primera {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recarga{/g} de cada combate cuesta 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} para los personajes de mundo fortaleza. Recargar el arma concede 10 acumulaciones adicionales de No dejes de disparar.
languages.original_text: Fortress world characters' first {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} in combat costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Reloading a weapon grants an additional +10 stacks of never stop shooting.

traits.locale_text: La primera recarga de cada combate cuesta 0 PA para los personajes de mundo fortaleza. Recargar el arma concede 10 acumulaciones adicionales de No dejes de disparar.

languages.text: Das erste {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Nachladen{/g} im Kampf kostet Bollwerkwelt-Charaktere 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Das Nachladen einer Waffe gewährt zusätzlich +10 Stapel von Nie das Schießen einstellen.
languages.original_text: Fortress world characters' first {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} in combat costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Reloading a weapon grants an additional +10 stacks of never stop shooting.

traits.locale_text: Das erste Nachladen im Kampf kostet Bollwerkwelt-Charaktere 0 AP. Das Nachladen einer Waffe gewährt zusätzlich +10 Stapel von Nie das Schießen einstellen.

languages.text: Le premier {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}rechargement{/g} effectué au combat par les personnages des mondes forteresses ne coûte aucun {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Le rechargement d'une arme confère un bonus de +10 cumuls de Tirs ininterrompus.
languages.original_text: Fortress world characters' first {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} in combat costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Reloading a weapon grants an additional +10 stacks of never stop shooting.

traits.locale_text: Le premier {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}rechargement{/g} effectué au combat par les personnages des mondes forteresses ne coûte aucun {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Le rechargement d'une arme confère un bonus de +10 cumuls de Tirs ininterrompus.

languages.text: Для персонажа с мира-крепости первая {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}перезарядка{/g} в бою не требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. Перезарядка оружия дает +10 уровней эффекта "стрелять изо всех сил" дополнительно.
languages.original_text: Fortress world characters' first {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} in combat costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Reloading a weapon grants an additional +10 stacks of never stop shooting.

traits.locale_text: Для персонажа из мира-крепости первая перезарядка в бою не требует затрат ОД. Перезарядка оружия дает +10 уровней эффекта "стрелять изо всех сил" дополнительно.

languages.text: 戦闘の中で要塞惑星のキャラクターの最初の{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}の消費が0になる。武器のリロードはネバーストップ・シューティングの追加スタックを+10与える。
languages.original_text: Fortress world characters' first {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} in combat costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Reloading a weapon grants an additional +10 stacks of never stop shooting.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘の中で要塞惑星のキャラクターの最初のリロードはAPの消費が0になる。武器のリロードはネバーストップ・シューティングの追加スタックを+10与える。

languages.text: Kale dünya karakterleri, çatışmadaki ilk silah {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}dolduruşlarını{/g} 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcayarak yaparlar. Silah doldurmak, ilave +10 tetiği asla bırakma birikimi kazandırır.
languages.original_text: Fortress world characters' first {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} in combat costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Reloading a weapon grants an additional +10 stacks of never stop shooting.
